Three Italian nuns die and go to heaven. 
 
 
 At the Pearly Gates, they are met by St. Peter. He says, 'Sisters, you all 
 Led such exemplary lives that the Lord is granting you six months to go
 Back to earth and be anyone you wish to be
 
 
 The first nun says, 'I want to be Sophia Loren;
 
 
 And *poof* she's gone.
 
 
 The second says, 'I want to be Madonna and *poof* she's gone. 
 
 
 The third says, 'I want to be Sara Pipalini..' 
 
 
 St. Peter looks perplexed. 'Who?' he asked. 
 
 
 'Sara Pipalini,' replies the nun.
 
 
 St. Peter shakes his head and says, 'I'm sorry, but that name just doesn't
 Ring a bell.'
 
 
 The nun then takes a newspaper out of her habit and hands it to St. Peter.
 
 
 St. Peter reads the paper and starts laughing. He hands it back to her and 
 Says.
 
 
 'No sister, the paper says it was the 'Sahara Pipeline' that was laid by 
 1,400 men in 6 months.'
 
 
 If you laugh, you're going straight to hell! 
 emoticon_smile emoticon_xangel emoticon_smile

So Moses and Jesus go into a bar, and while Moses goes to look for a table, Jesus goes up to the bar to order. He starts to ask the bartender for a pitcher of water, but is interrupted by a bellow from the back:
 
 Cheapskate!!!

post_info.post_title: It is a good joke....here's proof!

http://books.google.com/books?id=gOkSPQzuRg0C&pg=PA77&lpg=PA77&dq=virginia+pipeline+laid&source=web&ots=TieO_FE-k2&sig=qyuo8q5bD3AjUOFhVTPMEZiypko

 
 I like my version better. But thanks for contributing, for whatever value it adds. After all, I didn't write the joke, nor did I claim to.

Three guys are golfing in heaven. There is a body of water in between the three and the hole. The first guy hits the ball and gets a hole in one. Everyone applauds "nice job, Jesus". The second guy hits the ball and it ends up in the water. He then goes up to the water, divides it, hits the ball again and gets it in the hole. "Nicely done, Moses." The third guy hits the ball, it heads straight for the water - - a fish comes up taking the ball in its mouth, an eagle swoops down, grabs the fish, flies over to the hole, and shakes the fish who drops the ball in the hole. Jesus turns to the third man "Dad, quit screwing around and just play golf!"

The version I heard was of Moses whispering to Jesus "I hate playing against your dad...".
 
 Anyway:
 A priest and a mayor are playing golf. The mayor strikes the ball and misses. 
 "#$%"( I missed!". 
 The priest admonishes him: "Don't curse, or God will punish you!"
 
 They play on, and once more, the mayor misses. "#$%"( I missed!". 
 
 The priest once more says "I told you, don't curse, or God will punish you!"
 
 They play on, and once more, the mayor misses. "#$%"( I missed!". The verya next moment, a cloud appears above them and lightning strikes the priest! A voice sounds from the cloud:
 
 "#$%"( I missed!"

 Girl of sixteen, whole life ahead of her

 One Ratzinger, after a long and uneventful life, dies and comes to the gates of heaver. St. Peter receives him warmly (i.e. no brimstone), and hands him the keys to a nice VW Golf to drive around. He also points out that the speed limit is 50km/h.
 
 So our dear Ratziger starts the golf and oboediently drives around at 49.9 km/h. At the second turn, he's overtaken by a red Ferrari, doing some 320 km/h.
 
 After the shock settles, Ratzi returns to St. Peter to complain. The moment St. Peter hears of someone speeding in HIS heaven, he's enraged by the blatant disregard for rules and asks Ratzi whether he managed to get a look at the licence plate. "Sure I did, it was I-N-R-I".
 
 St. Peter immediately shushes him down: "Shh! That's the boss's kid!"

A guy finally gets a divorce from his overbearing wife and takes cruise to an island in the South Pacific. He's walkin' along the beach and sees a little green china bottle at the edge of the the surf. He uncorks it and out comes this genie, with praise and glory for the one who released him.
 
 "Master, you can have three wishes...but your ex-wife will get twice what you do."
 
 "That's fine with me, genie. First I'll have a Rolls Royce Silver Cloud Convertible, stuffed with $100 bills."
 
 Bingo! There is was. "But remember," said the genie, "your ex-wife got two of them."
 
 "And I'll have a mansion with servants and exotic foods flown in from all over the world throughout the years to come."
 
 Bingo! There it was up beyond the bluff that defined the beach. "But remember," said the genie, "your ex-wife got two of them."
 
 "And I want you to pick up that piece of drift wood and beat me half to death." said the man with a big grin on his face.
